M

main() - Static method in class minesweeper.Board
Main function of Board.java holds no particular significance and is left blank.
main(String[]) - Static method in class minesweeper.Menu
Main calls the constructor for Menu()
Menu - Class in minesweeper
Creates the menu that the user inputs information into and then verifies input and passes the input over to Board as well as calls setIcons() to set the static icon variables in the Tile class, the entry point of Minesweeper.
Menu() - Constructor for class minesweeper.Menu
Constructor just calls initMenu() which initializes the menu
mFlagged - Variable in class minesweeper.Tile
true if the tile is currenly flagged
mFlaggedIcon - Static variable in class minesweeper.Tile
Image for flag used on tiles
mFlags - Static variable in class minesweeper.Board
JLabel that displays the text containing Flags Available and also the current number of mFlags which is equivalent to Board.mNumFlags
mGame - Static variable in class minesweeper.Board
JFrame that displays the Tile objects that correspond to the minesweeper board.
mGame - Static variable in class minesweeper.Game_Driver
set equal to JFrame board in constructor from Board, game window that user interacts with
minesweeper - package minesweeper
 
mInfo - Static variable in class minesweeper.Board
JFrame that holds the replay JButton as well as the JLabel that tells the user how many mFlags are available to be placed still.
mIsMine - Variable in class minesweeper.Tile
true if the tile is a mine
mMineIcon - Static variable in class minesweeper.Tile
Image for mine used on tiles
mNumCols - Static variable in class minesweeper.Game_Driver
holds the number of columns
mNumFlags - Static variable in class minesweeper.Board
Number of mFlags available to the user which is equal to the number of mines on the board.
mNumMines - Static variable in class minesweeper.Game_Driver
holds the number of mines
mNumRows - Static variable in class minesweeper.Game_Driver
holds the number of rows
mOpened - Variable in class minesweeper.Tile
true if the tile is open
mouseListener - Variable in class minesweeper.Tile
MouseListener that controls the tiles right and left click
mPressedIcon - Static variable in class minesweeper.Tile
Image for a pressed tile if surrounding mines are 0 use on tile
mSurroundingMines - Variable in class minesweeper.Tile
holds the number of adjacent mines
mTileArray - Static variable in class minesweeper.Game_Driver
2D Tile array of used for game logic, equal coordinates to nXm game board
mTileIcon - Static variable in class minesweeper.Tile
Image for tile used on tiles
mTileSize - Static variable in class minesweeper.Tile
The length and width of all tiles
